column1: 1. The firm shall enter into a contract agreement with AAI to be signed on non
judicial paper of Rs. 100/- within a period of 05 days from the effective
date of award of work. The cost of the judicial paper shall be borne by the
2. 50 Pair Krone block along with Cross jumper wire for each EPABX system
shall be provided and installed by seller at the sellers cost.
3. Seller has to provide 03 years on site comprehensive warranty for EPABX
system and UPS. The cost of replacement of all spares Accessories/Peripherals
in EPABX and UPS will be at the sellers cost as it is included in the quoted cost.
No additional cost shall be paid by AAI.
4. Seller has to provide original EPABX software
5. Payment may be made after successful supply, installation, testing and
commissioning of EPABX systems and UPS
